skill.name: content-agent
skill.description: Generates personalized marketing content for Unite-Hub. Creates followup emails, proposals, and case studies based on contact data and interaction history. Uses Claude AI for high-quality, contextual content generation.
skill.summary: Generates personalized marketing content for Unite-Hub. Creates followup emails, proposals, and case...
skill.author: CleanExpo

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. Only contains documentation and prompt templates for content generation. Network calls are limited to Anthropic Claude API and Convex backend, both legitimate and documented.

content.user_title: Create personalized marketing emails and proposals
content.value_statement: Marketing teams waste hours writing individual followup emails and proposals. This skill generates contextually relevant, personalized content for each contact by analyzing their profile, interaction history, and engagement signals using Claude AI.
actual_capabilities: Generate followup emails based on contact interaction history and engagement scores
Create personalized proposal emails for high-engagement prospects
Reference relevant case studies matched to contact industry
Build context objects from contact data and interaction patterns
Store generated drafts for human review and approval
Track content performance metrics including opens, clicks, and conversions
limitations: Requires existing contact data in Unite-Hub to function effectively
Generated content requires human review before sending
Does not integrate with external email platforms directly
Cannot access real-time market data or competitor information

use_cases.title: Automate followup outreach
use_cases.description: Generate hundreds of personalized followup emails for leads ready for contact based on engagement signals and past interactions.

use_cases.title: Create targeted proposals
use_cases.description: Produce customized proposal emails for high-scoring prospects with specific pain points, budget indicators, and timeline requirements.

use_cases.title: Reference similar case studies
use_cases.description: Find and reference case studies from similar companies in the prospect industry to build credibility and trust.

prompt_templates.title: Generate followup email
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a professional followup email for [NAME] at [COMPANY]. Last interaction: [LAST_INTERACTION]. Sentiment: [SENTIMENT]. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Reference their interest and propose a 15-minute strategy call. Keep under 150 words.

prompt_templates.title: Create proposal email
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a proposal email for [NAME] at [COMPANY]. Pain point: [PAIN_POINT]. Budget: [BUDGET]. Timeline: [TIMELINE]. Address their specific need, outline 3-4 deliverables, mention expected results, and request a call to discuss.

prompt_templates.title: Case study reference
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a brief case study reference for [NAME] at [COMPANY] in [INDUSTRY]. Include key metrics from a similar client, specific results achieved, and how it applies to their situation.

prompt_templates.title: Review and edit draft
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this draft email for [NAME] at [COMPANY]. Improve clarity, strengthen the call-to-action, and ensure the tone matches their industry. Keep the same key points.

output_examples.input: Generate a followup email for Sarah Chen at FinTech Labs. She showed interest in our marketing automation services last week. Her sentiment is positive. She's a CEO in the financial technology sector.
output: Subject: Quick followup on your marketing automation interest

I enjoyed our recent conversation about FinTech Labs' marketing automation needs. Given your goal of increasing qualified leads by 35%, I wanted to share how we helped similar FinTech companies achieve that target.

Our client GrowthBank saw a 42% increase in qualified leads within 90 days of implementing our automation strategy. They particularly valued the personalized nurture sequences that aligned with their sales cycle.
Would you have 15 minutes this week for a quick strategy call? I'd love to explore how we could achieve similar results for FinTech Labs.

best_practices: Provide rich contact data including industry, job title, and specific pain points for better personalization
Always review and personalize generated content before sending to maintain brand voice
Use the AI score filter to prioritize contacts most likely to convert
Track performance metrics to understand which content types perform best
anti_patterns: Using the skill without first ensuring contact data is complete and accurate
Sending generated content without human review or personalization
Relying solely on AI-generated content without adding industry-specific insights
Ignoring negative sentiment signals when generating followup content

faq.question: What AI models does this skill use?
faq.answer: The skill uses Claude Sonnet 4.5 via the Anthropic API for content generation. It selects the appropriate model based on content complexity.

faq.question: What contact data is required?
faq.answer: Minimum required fields are name, company, and last interaction. For best results, include industry, job title, pain points, and sentiment.

faq.question: Does this integrate with email platforms?
faq.answer: The skill generates content drafts stored in Convex. Integration with external email platforms requires additional setup in Unite-Hub.

faq.question: Is customer data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. All contact data stays within your Unite-Hub workspace. The skill only sends prompts to Anthropic's Claude API with contact context.

faq.question: Why is my generated content generic?
faq.answer: The quality depends on contact data richness. Add specific pain points, industry details, and recent interactions for better personalization.

faq.question: How is this different from standard Claude prompts?
faq.answer: This skill provides structured workflows, context building, and integration with your contact database for scalable content generation.
